00733 inline TStatusItem::TStatusItem( const char *aText,
00734                                  ushort key,
00735                                  ushort cmd,
00736                                  TStatusItem *aNext
00737                                 ) :
00738     next( aNext ),
00739     text( newStr(aText) ),
00740     keyCode( key ),
00741     command( cmd )
00742 {
00743 }
00744 
00745 inline TStatusItem::~TStatusItem()
00746 {
00747     delete text;
00748 }
